## Matrix4x4.setRow() method

Set values to a row in the matrix.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setRow(row: number, v: Vector4): this;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  row | number | The row index |
|  v | [Vector4](doc/markdown/./base.vector4.md) | The values to be set |

this
